content.text: Comfortable location and cozy atmosphere – all these factors contribute to success of the event.
We propose you our hall “Gotovo” for different types of event: photoshoots, сonferetions, training sessions, master classes, poetry reading, books launch, social events, etc.

Our location is – Pecherska metro station, floor space – 80 meters square. Hall is equipped with all necessary equipment: chairs, tables, TV, video camera for videoconferences, microphones, speakers, air conditioner, flipchart and of course Wi-Fi.
Holding event at “Gotovo” costs 1200 UAH per hour (indicated cost does not include bank commission).
